example.text: The GOP's #DefaultOnAmerica Act would be devastating for New York. This bill means: ?Eliminating pre-k & childcare slots ?Raising housing costs ?Threatening veterans' medical coverage ?Reducing food assistance ?Gutting funding for students We cannot default on NY families.
It's #InfrastructureWeek & we're highlighting investments NYS has already received thanks to the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw. ...& the good news is, we are just getting started! [[url]]

US Route 20 is the longest highway in NYS & across the country. Proud to lead legislation dedicating Rt. 20 as the National Medal of Honor Highway, recognizing our nation's bravest & the courageous sacrifices they have made. [[url]]

The GOP's #DefaultOnAmerica Act would be devastating for New York. This bill means: ?Eliminating pre-k & childcare slots ?Raising housing costs ?Threatening veterans' medical coverage ?Reducing food assistance ?Gutting funding for students We cannot default on NY families.

Starting May 12, the US will finally drop its COVID vaccine requirement for Canadians entering the US. After 3 years, we are finally at a turning point in rebuilding the relationships between our cross-border communities. [[url]]

The GOP's #DefaultOnAmerica Act would be devastating for New York. This bill means: ?Eliminating pre-k & childcare slots ?Raising housing costs ?Threatening veterans' medical coverage ?Reducing food assistance ?Gutting funding for students We cannot default on NY families.
